Name: Encounter: The Blob
Description:
Before the game begins, put The Blob onto the field.
If there are no cards named The Blob on the field, you win the game.
After you draw a hero card from the encounter deck, discard it, remove 1 damage from each enemy named The Blob, and surge.

Name: The Blob
Description:
This enemy gets +X üó°Ô∏è, where X half is the number of enemies named The Blob on the field, rounded down. This effect can't be blanked.
This enemy gets +X ‚ù§Ô∏è, where X is 32 divided by the number of enemies named The Blob on the field, rounded down. This effect can't be blanked.

Name: Swallow Whole
Description:
Shuffle each hero card on your field into the encounter deck.
If no cards were shuffled into the encounter deck this way, surge.

Name: Incorporate
Description:
Turn each non-elite enemy face down. Each of those enemies are now a copy of The Blob.
Evenly redistribute the damage on enemies named The Blob among each enemy named The Blob, rounded down.
If no enemies were turned face down this way, surge and, after this night ends, shuffle this event into the encounter deck.

Name: Acid Burns
Description: After you draw a hero card from the encounter deck, lose 1 vitality.

Name: Get Stuck
Description:
Shuffle each hero card in your hand into the encounter deck.
If no cards were shuffled into the encounter deck this way, surge.

Name: Sticky Coating
Description: After you play an action that deals damage to The Blob, shuffle it into the encounter deck.

Name: Absorb
Description:
Shuffle each hero card on your partner's field into the encounter deck.
If no cards were shuffled into the encounter deck this way, surge.
After this night ends, shuffle this event into the encounter deck.

Name: Mitosis
Description:
Put the top X cards of the encounter deck onto the field face down, where X is the number of enemies named The Blob on the field. Each of those cards are now a copy of The Blob.
Evenly redistribute the damage on enemies named The Blob among each enemy named The Blob, rounded down.
